name: Riley Exploration Permian, LLC
description: Riley Exploration Permian, LLC is an independent oil and gas exploration and production company focused on developing assets in the prolific Permian Basin of West Texas and New Mexico. Founded in 2015, the company has quickly established itself as a key player in the energy sector, leveraging advanced technologies and operational efficiencies to maximize resource recovery. Riley Exploration's strategy includes acquiring and developing high-quality oil and natural gas properties, emphasizing environmental stewardship and sustainable practices. With a commitment to innovation, the company employs a disciplined approach to capital allocation, ensuring robust returns for shareholders while maintaining a strong balance sheet. Riley Exploration is dedicated to optimizing production through the utilization of modern drilling techniques and enhanced oil recovery methods. As part of its growth strategy, the company continuously seeks opportunities for expansion and development within its core areas. The leadership team at Riley Exploration boasts extensive industry experience, allowing the company to navigate the complexities of the energy market effectively. Through a focus on operational excellence and a proactive approach to risk management, Riley Exploration positions itself for long-term success in a rapidly changing energy landscape.
